verses.text: Not unto us, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, not unto us, but unto thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, for thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, \add and\add* for thy \w truth’s|strong="H0571"\w* sake.
Wherefore should the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Where \add is\add* now their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?
But our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* in the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*: he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* whatsoever he hath \w pleased|strong="H2654"\w*.
Their \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* \add are\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of \w men’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.
They have \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w*, but they \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* not: \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* have they, but they \w see|strong="H7200"\w* not:
They have \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, but they \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* not: \w noses|strong="H0639"\w* have they, but they \w smell|strong="H7306"\w* not:

They have \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, but they \w handle|strong="H4184"\w* not: \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* have they, but they \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* not: neither \w speak|strong="H1897"\w* they through their \w throat|strong="H1627"\w*.
They that \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them are like unto them; \add so is\add* every one that \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* in them.
O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* thou in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: he \add is\add* their \w help|strong="H5828"\w* and their \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*.

O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: he \add is\add* their \w help|strong="H5828"\w* and their \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*.

Ye that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: he \add is\add* their \w help|strong="H5828"\w* and their \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath been \w mindful|strong="H2142"\w* of us: he will \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \add us;\add* he will \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; he will \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*.

He will \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add both\add* \w small|strong="H6996"\w* and \w great|strong="H1419"\w*.\f + \fr 115.13 \ft and: Heb. with\f*
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w increase|strong="H3254"\w* you more and more, you and your \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.
Ye \add are\add* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

The \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \add even\add* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \add are\add* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* hath he \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.
The \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd*, neither any that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into \w silence|strong="H1745"\w*.

But we will \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d* from this time forth and \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*.
